CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Startdate__c ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( Startdate__c ) , DAY( Startdate__c ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), DAY (Today()) - DAY ( IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Stopdate__c ) ), Stopdate__c ), Startdate__c ), DAY (Today()) - DAY ( IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Stopdate__c ) ), Stopdate__c ), Startdate__c ) -1 ), null)
CustomField.label: Age
